divs: Sighting DetailsWhile standing in front yard showing my grandaughter the rising near full moon to the eastsaw an object travel from northwest to southeast a halph a little finger width below moon traveling at a high rate of speed with no contrail. Object was bright white and was able to capture image on my flip video and was witnessed by my wife.We watched object travel into Mexico over I would guess El Condor area. It reminded me of when space shuttle would pass over during orbit. Sun out no clouds in sky temp appy 78 deg.Time 5 09 p.m. Pacific
Summary: While looking at near full moon in cloudless sky saw a bright white object pass from northeast to southwest below angle of moon in relation to myself was able to capture on flip video although hard to see it was traveling at high rate of speed
trends: There have been no other sightings in same
This sighting has never been favorited.
